MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L25 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Wellgreen Road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20pm on 26th December 2020.
